Author: tribbe
Title: [New ANN] Mobius a universal protocol token API for the blockchain ecosystem
Body: I'm really looking forward to the product launch months after the ICO/crowdsale starting on the 18th of January. I think that there will be a huge synergy in the combination of Mobius (https://mobius.network/) and Stellar/XLM. There's a great article about the dApp-Store and other features of Mobius here: https://medium.com/mobius-network/stellars-meteoric-rise-and-why-mobius-is-set-to-orbit-from-it-in-2018-27f49d0bb348.  The most notable fact is, that they're expanding from their dApp-Platform with transparent APIs and protocols on Stellar. They're adding an interface to connect almost any digital service to the Stellar network (different blockchains, established (payment-)services, smart-contracts, machine-to-machine-payments etc.).  Stellar will be a complete package disrupting a lot of platforms and coins: After FairX launched it's decentralized exchange with maybe XLM-pairings, there's only missing the mobius enhancements to expand the Stellar network to an endless platform of possibilities.  That's why I'm really looking forward to the crowdsale starting in about a week from now.

Author: Eigenspace
Title: [New ANN] Mobius a universal protocol token API for the blockchain ecosystem
Body: @Samueltalk et al. Mobius would love to get developers connected and building awesome projects on the DApp Store where they can earn Mobius (for now, expanding to other blockchains in due course).  We currently have a referral program of 7,000 Mobius for every developer until August 8th for submissions that are submitted and approved.  There is also a developer referral bonus of 7,000 Mobius as well for developers that submit approved apps lasting until August 8th.  Also, if anyone has interesting ideas or contributions that they would like to make in terms of connecting apps to blockchain or adding to the development of Mobius please DM me.  Here are the API docs for reference: https://mobius.network/docs/#authentication  Thanks!

Author: Eigenspace
Title: [New ANN] Mobius a universal protocol token API for the blockchain ecosystem
Body: Mobius (MOBI): A Universal Protocol Suite for the Blockchain Ecosystem   http://i.imgur.com/qPLBZ9Z.png  Mobius connects every developer, app, and device to the blockchain economy through an easy to use bidirectional API. This simple API bridges the gap between the off-chain world and the blockchain world. Blockchain developer tools are currently hard to use, primitive, and comparable to web developer tools in the early 1990â€™s. Mobius addresses this problem by building key infrastructure that allows any developer to easily integrate with any blockchain and accept payments or create their own cryptographically secure token. Mobius also allows developers to easily receive off-chain events about blockchain actions such as token payments while simultaneously providing solutions for developers to easily create oracles that update smart contracts with information from the real world, such as predicting and sourcing mission critical parts for assembly line fab equipment in Shanghai.  Mobius is the first organization to use the Stellar platform. Mobius is building innovative universal blockchain API protocols and a DApp Store that will connect billions of people, apps, and devices to the blockchain ecosystem. In fact, there are already a couple apps in the DApp Store, which is live now for developers to plug, play, and build in while accepting micro-payments from the blockchain economy.  There is currently a token Pre-Sale slated to end on August 8th, 2017.  Developer Referral Program: The Mobius team is starting a developer referral program for the DApp Store. People that refer developers who submit an app before Tuesday August 8th, 2017 at 12:00pm PST, that is approved, will receive 7,000 free MOBI in the pre-sale. Just have the developer email referral@mobius.network your name and email address so we can contact you about sending you your free MOBI.  Developers Earn Mobius token (MOBI): Each user that signs up for the DApp Store is given 1,000 free credits to spend in apps. The developer of an app that receives credits will receive an equal number of MOBI after the token Pre-Sale. User credits do not convert or in anyway exchange into MOBI. Only developers that earn credits will be rewarded with MOBI.       Website: https://mobius.network/  Mobius White Paper: https://mobius.network/mobius_white_paper.pdf  Mobius API Documentation: https://mobius.network/docs/#introduction  Mobius DApp Store: https://mobius.network/store  Slack: https://mobius-slack-invite.herokuapp.com/  Twitter: https://twitter.com/mobius_network

Author: Eigenspace
Title: [New ANN] Mobius a universal protocol token API for the blockchain ecosystem
Body: @100degrees Currently, that is in development.  Right now, we are focusing on developers.  @labuan Kindly refer to the link to the white paper, functional DApp Store with apps on it (released recently), and API Documentation, which is published above. Essentially, Mobius makes it easy to create and connect applications to the blockchain ecosystem, which is very difficult right now and requires additional domain expertise. Also, the total supply is listed in the white paper (888,000,000 MOBI) please read it before making non-specific conjectures. Thanks!

Author: Eigenspace
Title: [New ANN] Mobius a universal protocol token API for the blockchain ecosystem
Body: We plan to have a more traditional campaign, more on that soon.  Also, further updates, we just acquired BitBounce (blockchain spam solution with cryptocurrency Credo backed by Tim Draper) as our fist major account for cross-blockchain integration partner now featured on the DApp Store.  More info here BitBounce cross-blockchain integration with Mobius: https://medium.com/mobius-network/bitbounce-chooses-mobius-for-blockchain-integration-aea971d176d2  Also, we are proud to announce that Jed McCaleb (founder of Rippler and Stellar) has joined us as an key advisor: https://medium.com/mobius-network/making-decentralized-commerce-a-reality-with-the-mobi-stellar-network-token-and-dapp-store-93aec38cde71
